description: Caring for a cat involves understanding their independent nature while providing for their health, safety, and enrichment needs.
sentences: Cats are creatures of habit and thrive on routine.
Provide a clean litter box; cats are very particular about hygiene.
Regular playtime is essential for a cat's mental and physical health.
A balanced diet of quality cat food is crucial.
Ensure they have access to fresh, clean water at all times.
dos: Get your cat vaccinated and dewormed regularly.
Provide scratching posts to save your furniture.
Spay or neuter your cat to prevent unwanted litters and health issues.
Groom them regularly, especially long-haired breeds.
donts: Don't force interactions; let the cat come to you.
Never declaw a cat; it is cruel and harmful.
Don't feed them dog food or milk (most cats are lactose intolerant).
Don't let them roam outside unsupervised in cities.
